sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RANGE in gunnery, the path of a bullet, or the line it deſcribes from the mouth of the piece to the point where it lodges. If the piece lie in a line parallel to the horizon, it is called the right or level range : if it be mounted to 45 % it is ſaid to have the utmofi range ; all others between 00 and 45 u are called the intermediate ranges. -
